name: The Final Feast
description:
The Final Feast is a strategy game all about throwing food around. Play as a squirrel, pick up food, and throw them at enemies!

This game was made for Cozy Autumn Game Jam (2022), the theme was Cozy Autumn, and the mechanic was One Room Only.

Controls:

WASD to move

Space to throw

Credits:

Programming: Gearless

Art: Heberook

SFX, Design: Busy Hamster/Jeffrey

Music by Sashqxxx
